metadata.title: CVE-2022-29910 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description:
When closed or sent to the background, Firefox for Android would notproperly record and persist HSTS settings.
*Note: This issue onlyaffected Firefox for Android. Other operating systems are unaffected.*.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 100.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
